references.paper_title: eDiffi: Text-to-image diffusion models with an ensemble of expert denoisers
references.reason: This work is foundational, establishing diffusion models with expert denoisers in image generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This article is foundational work on latent diffusion models, critical for high-resolution image synthesis, as mentioned in the paper.

references.paper_title: Repaint: Inpainting using denoising diffusion probabilistic models
references.reason: This paper introduces RePaint, an important technique for inpainting using denoising diffusion probabilistic models that this paper uses as a starting point.

references.paper_title: Generative omnimatte: Learning to decompose video into layers
references.reason: This introduces a recent generative approach for Omnimatte based on video diffusion priors.

references.paper_title: Omnimatte: Associating objects and their effects in video
references.reason: This paper is foundational in establishing the concept of Omnimatte, a key area of focus in the main paper.
